pages.text: Telescope has full compatibility with ComputerCraft and OpenComputers. You can rotate telescope and observe bodies.

$(3)telescope.rotateTelescope(x, y)$() - Rotate telescope by specified x, y step.$(br)$(br)$(3)telescope.getObservationStatus()$() - [object, progress, relative_x, relative_y] Returns table with information of currently observed body. Empty response if nothing is observed.$(br)$(br)$(3)telescope.getResearchedBodies()$() - Returns list of all researched bodies.
